# Preface {-}

A reference for concepts & equations in introductory statistics. The source code is hosted on [GitHub](https://github.com/kelly-sovacool/stats-ref).

I used Sean Kross' [bookdown starter kit](https://github.com/seankross/bookdown-start) to begin creating this R Markdown book.
